Class CustomExpandableListAdapter

java.lang.Object
  android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.editor.menu.CustomExpandableListAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList
public class CustomExpandableListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter

The Class CustomExpandableListAdapter provides an adapter to handle data displayed in an ExpandableListView
